Commentary: decent nip to start from Steyn, angling a length delivery across Dickwella, who pushes to cover

a drive, an edge, and Miller holds a simple catch! This must be some sort of record - two balls into his wicketkeeping career, he's got a catch. It was a nice, easy one too, flying through at head height and straight to him. The feet didn't even need to move. And didn't
Dismissal_text: N Dickwella c †Miller b Steyn 0 (1m 2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: nice shape from Steyn, curving the ball away outside off stump as Kusal leaves it alone
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: another outswinger, and this one is punched neatly to cover point - straight at the field
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: lift and movement outside off! Steyn bustles in and bursts one past Kusal, who pulls his bat well inside the line
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: and again! Kusal just dropped the hands as this one fizzed away from him outside off. Cracking start from Steyn, who is still a handful in any format, and marks his comeback to T20Is with a wicket maiden
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: and he hits a length on off stump to start, Avishka defending the 141km/h delivery
fuller this time, and a touch of seam into him at 143km/h as Avishka flicks to midwicket
biffed over long on! Huge hit from Avishka, who kept his shape in the shot. And it's his first scoring shot in this format for Sri Lanka
Avishka stays deep in the crease, nudging into the leg side
big swish outside off, Kusal throwing his hands through a drive but hitting only fresh air. Perhaps he was beaten for pace - KG's up at 148km/h
Commentary_short: Rabada to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: chipped to mid on! Kusal drives uppishly, and the ball carries straight to Sipamla in the position for an easy catch - his first in international cricket
Dismissal_text: BKG Mendis c Sipamla b Rabada 0 (8m 6b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: full, and nipping away from him at 143km/h as Avishka pokes to cover
change-up from Steyn, sending this one down at just 128km/h. Avishka has a look, and lets it go
even slower from Steyn, lobbing this one down at 120km/h, but it's read and nudged to mid on
short, and it's pulled out to the man at deep square
he's off the mark straight away, pushing a drive to Phehlukwayo at cover and pinching a quick single

pulled in front of square! Avishka rocks back into an imperious pull, hitting it 68 metres onto the grass banks and well in front of square. Caught in the crowd, too. And the catcher is subsequently engulfed by his mates and doused in beer. The ball might come back a little tipsy ...
sharp yorker! Rabada endangers the toes with a full one, but Kamindu does well to keep it out
Commentary_short: Rabada to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: in the air, but safe! Kamindu looks to clear square leg, but he doesn't get a great strike. It is enough to evade the infield though
pushed softly to mid on
tip-and-run single to end the over, the call coming nice and early as the ball rolls to cover

top edged, and over third man! Rabada slings down a back of a length delivery that spits up at Kamindu, who swings wildly at it, looking to attack the leg side. The ball goes in the other direction, clearing third man
Commentary_short: Rabada to PHKD Mendis, SIX runs

Commentary: same direction, but with authority this time. Kamindu leans back and plays a fluent ramped uppercut, the ball just clearing the boundary
Commentary_short: Rabada to PHKD Mendis, SIX runs

Commentary: fired in full and at the pads, Avishka flicking to midwicket for a single
again Steyn attacks the stumps, Kamindu pinging the leg side field with a glance
Commentary_short: Steyn to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: flicked in the air towards short fine leg, and the ball dips awkwardly and bounces in front of Duminy, who dives but can't get his hands to it. Steyn's not happy
Commentary_short: Steyn to PHKD Mendis, FOUR runs

Commentary: thumped down the ground! Kamindu is in a rush, and though his bottom hand takes over this drive and the bat turns in his hands, he hits it straight enough and hard enough to beat the field
Commentary_short: Steyn to PHKD Mendis, FOUR runs

Commentary: pushed to cover, and they pinch a quick single
Avishka taps to cover and wants a single, but he's sent back
and he shoots a length delivery across Kamindu's bows first up, the ball chopped to cover
slung down very full but towards the leg side, and Avishka gets a bit of boot on it to collect a leg bye
Kamindu flings his hands through a drive outside off, the ball shooting off the inside half of the bat and into the leg side

excellent work on the boundary by Hendricks! Avishka heaved mightily at a length delivery, a slower cutter, and got some serious air on the shot, but Reeza made ground at the boundary and demonstrated superb spatial awareness, holding the catch inches from the rope, lobbing the ball back into play as his momentum carried him over, and then popping back in to hold the catch. Good stuff
Dismissal_text: WIA Fernando c Hendricks b Sipamla 16 (25m 15b 0x4 2x6) SR: 106.66

Commentary: uppish! He's forward to drive, but without much control. Fortunately the ball dips in front of cover ...
Commentary_short: Sipamla to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: Sipamla aims full and straight to finish, at 133km/h, and then fields in his follow through as the ball is pushed back at him
Commentary_short: Sipamla to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: Tahir spears in a legbreak on off stump, and they take on point for a quick single. The shy is accurate, and it's a direct hit, but he's safely home and they steal another run off the ricochet
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to AK Perera, 2 runs

Commentary: a solid drive bursts through the hands of a diving cover, Reeza sprinting in from the ropes to keep them to one
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to AK Perera, 1 run

Commentary: worked into the leg side for one
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to PHKD Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: googly from Tahir, but it's read by Angelo and kept out with a forward defensive
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to AK Perera, no run

Commentary: pushed back down the ground, but Tahir dives across to save the run
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to AK Perera, no run

Commentary: this one is held back at 76km/h, and there's some turn and bounce as a result, but it's pushed behind point for a single
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to AK Perera, 1 run

Commentary: very full outside off at 139km/h, and it's driven out to the sweeper
cracked back at the bowler, who can't get his hands to it in his follow through and misses the chance - albeit a difficult one. And that also brings up the fifty
Commentary_short: Sipamla to PHKD Mendis, FOUR runs

Commentary: flicked off the pads and out to Andile at deep square, turning the strike over
full, and it's dug out to mid on. Faf has a shy, but Angelo calls early and is safely home at the danger end
Sipamla pulls his length back, Kamindu rolling his wrists over a pull into the deep
offcutter to end the over, at 125km/h, and it's dead-batted towards cover
and he hits a length, just outside off, Angelo threading a drive just past cover
play and a miss outside off as Phehlukwayo finds some seam movement away from the bat
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: rising off a length outside off, and it's chopped down to third man for a single
Phehlukwayo pulls his length back, Angelo dropping his hands to let the ball pass
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to AK Perera, no run

Commentary: offcutter, and it's nurdled in front of square for a single
full, on off stump, and it's pushed to cover for a single
Kamindu whips his wrists over a full one and finds a single near midwicket
full, and seaming in to him. Angelo flicks straight to midwicket - de Kock in that position
Commentary_short: Sipamla to AK Perera, no run

Commentary: chopped down close on the off side, and he's called through
rising outside off, and a cut finds the cover sweeper
slower ball, a cutter at 122km/h, and it's nudged behind square for a sharp single
pulled off the front foot to midwicket, who is on the edge of the circle, and they take him on for a single
floated up just outside off and breaking back into the left hander, who pushes back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: Kamindu is forward to drive to long off
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to PHKD Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: big turn for Tahir! It's flighted, dips on the batsman, and rips past a slog into the leg side
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to AK Perera, no run

Commentary: pushed to mid on for a quick single
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to AK Perera, 1 run

Commentary: Kamindu turns into a reverse sweep at a low full toss, the fielder in the deep cleaning up
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to PHKD Mendis, 1 run

Commentary: slashed up and over extra cover! Plenty of bottom hand in the shot, and he places it very nicely, well wide of long off
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to AK Perera, FOUR runs

Commentary: chipped in the air, but safe! De Kock is the man at cover, and he sprints and dives across the practice pitch but he can't quite get to it. That would have been a first!
bowled him! Phehlukwayo aims full with a cross-seamed delivery, the ball zipping through Angelo's slog and smashing into the stumps
dug in short by Phehlukwayo, and though it's only 125km/h Thisara ducks well under it
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: whipped powerfully off the pads, but there's protection in the deep
it's short again, but too short and too wide outside off
tapped into the gap between mid off and cover, and they sprint through for a quick single
beaten outside off! Phehlukwayo hits the channel and Thisara punches inside the line
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: stumped! Wonderfully bowled by Tahir, fizzing a googly past the advancing Kamindu, the ball gripping and spinning past him. Behind the stumps, Miller reads it, takes it cleanly, and whips the bails off in a flash. A catch, and now a stumping! Tahir sets off to celebrate with the crowd near midwicket as his team-mates mob Miller
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to PHKD Mendis, OUT
Dismissal_text: PHKD Mendis st †Miller b Imran Tahir 41 (45m 29b 3x4 2x6) SR: 141.37

Commentary: pushed down to long on, and he's off the mark straight away
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: punted back in the air, but well wide of Tahir, and down to long off for a single
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to NLTC Perera, 1 run

Commentary: slider, but it's pushed down the leg side. Another tidy take from Miller, moving to his left
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to de Silva, 1 wide

Commentary: flicked wide of a diving midwicket for a single
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: beaten by the googly! Excellent line from Tahir, and Thisara is beaten on the outside edge
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: a skimming drive finds extra cover
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: chopped down through gully, just the one
glanced off the hip, and out to deep square
Dhananjaya angles his bat on a full one, but he can't get past Rassie in the gully
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to de Silva, no run

Commentary: Dhananjaya's slightly squared up by a length delivery that holds its line, pushing to cover
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to de Silva, no run

Commentary: short at 134km/h, and Dhananjaya hammers a pull but finds Reeza at deep square leg
swatted over long on! Too full, and Thisara punishes it over the boundary for an 83 metre six
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to NLTC Perera, SIX runs

Commentary: eased down to long on for a single
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: slapped in the air, but bouncing well short of de Kock, out at long off
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to NLTC Perera, 1 run

Commentary: driven in the air but past a leaping cover fielder, and Steyn out at the boundary cleans up
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: Thisara keeps his bat straight to drive to de Kock at long off
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to NLTC Perera, 1 run

Commentary: very full, and it's dug out back to the bowler, 8th dot ball for Tahir
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to de Silva, no run

Commentary: googly to finish, and it's floated up nice and high, but read and manoeuvred past midwicket
Commentary_short: Imran Tahir to de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: pushed down the leg side, and he'll have to bowl that one again
hurled down the leg side again, and KG's not quite found his radar yet
that's better, honing in on off stump and it's pushed towards cover, where they take on the fielder for a quick single
another one! Speared way too far outside off. And Umpire Jele also warns Rabada about his front foot as well, which apparently is too close to the line
chipped up and over cover, and they're back for a second to raise the hundred
short and rising outside off stump, and Thisara is peeved with himself as he misses an uppercut
Commentary_short: Rabada to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: slapped out through cover, Reeza making ground in the deep to save the boundary
Thisara has a heave at a full one, the ball flying past his outside edge and Miller doing a functional job of stopping it behind the stumps
Commentary_short: Rabada to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: Thisara is cramped for room as he cuts, and in any case finds the point fielder
Commentary_short: Rabada to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: edged, well wide of Miller and bouncing down to third man, where Rabada puts in a committed dive and saves two runs. He had just been moved finer by Steyn at the start of the over
Dhananjaya backs away and hacks, the ball leaping over his head and carrying at head height through to Miller
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: slower ball from Steyn, down to 118km/h, and the ball comes off the inside half of a heave, rolling through square leg

slugged down the ground, and de Kock runs across to stop it at long off. He flings in a throw, which Steyn lets past him as he walks back to his mark, but the ball hits a footmark as it reaches Miller, bouncing right through his legs for more runs. Quinny can see the funny side down at the boundary, but I'm not sure Steyn is smiling
dug in short and fast, the ball bursting past Dhananjaya's pull
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: chopped out through cover, just the single
big heave from Dhananjaya, but he can only find a single to long on
Sipamla comes around the stumps, angling the ball in and then seaming it away to beat Thisara outside off
Commentary_short: Sipamla to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: canny slower ball from Sipamla, the change-up arriving at just 120km/h as Thisara is too early into a swipe outside off
Commentary_short: Sipamla to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: short, and it's hit him! Thisara aimed to pull, but the bouncer hit him on the peak of the helmet instead, and they run through for a single. The umpire's check with Thisara, and the physio is out too, but Thisara insists he's good to go
Commentary_short: Sipamla to NLTC Perera, 1 leg bye

Commentary: short of a length, outside off at 136km/h, and it's mistimed down the ground through mid on
another lovely slower cutter from Sipamla at 120km/h, and Thisara takes his bottom hand off the bat as he flaps it in the air out to long on, the ball bouncing safely in the outfield

caught by du Plessis at long off! Phehlukwayo starts with a slower ball at just 110km/h, and Thisara slices under his heave down the ground. Faf takes a few steps in, then stops and tumbles backwards as the ball reaches him, holding the catch cleanly, and Phehlukwayo has his second
Dismissal_text: NLTC Perera c du Plessis b Phehlukwayo 19 (32m 21b 0x4 1x6) SR: 90.47

Commentary: bowled him! Dhananjaya walks across a seam-up delivery, bowled at 126km/h, looking to lap it up and over short fine leg. But he goes too far across it with Andile targeting the stumps, and he's bowled. Phehlukwayo is on a hat-trick!
Dismissal_text: DM de Silva  b Phehlukwayo 14 (30m 19b 0x4 0x6) SR: 73.68

Commentary: and it's kept out! Phehlukwayo aims a very full one at middle and leg, but Akila's bat is down in time to jam it out
yet another dot for Andile, the fourth of the over, as Akila digs another full one out to cover
slashed over extra cover, Akila making room and making sure to slap a full one over the infield, placing it wide of long off
edged to the boundary! Andile aims full outside off with a quicker ball and Akila swings wildly at it, a thick edge going wide of Miller and bouncing down to third man
dot to start! Rabada aims full outside off, and Udana swings a drive airily past the ball

dropping short of third man! Udana slices under a back-of-a-length outside off, and Tahir comes in from the boundary, but decides at the last moment not to go for it as the ball bounces awkwardly in front of him
short, Udana heaves and a top edge flies over the keeper and down to the boundary
Rabada aims full at 148km/h, Udana letting his bottom hand do the work to collect two runs out to deep midwicket
another short one, and it's nippy at 146km/h but too short and it's called wide. Rabada walks muttering back to his mark. It's not quite been his day today
slapped airily out into the deep, the ball landing in no-man's land to the left of Faf at long off

edged, and dropped by Tahir at third man! It wasn't an easy chance as once again the ball was dipping on Tahir even as he ran forward towards it. He got the hands to it, but it popped out like a bar of soap and slipped out of his grasp
full toss, very wide outside off, and de Kock stretches towards the ball to tap it away
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on off, and de Kock pushes forward to drive. Huge outside edge and this flies past the keeper's left
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball on leg, and worked off his pads to square leg. No chance of a single
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on off, and he tries to muscle a shot to the leg side. Muscled to mid-on
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: slower ball, full outside off and jagging away from de Kock. He's through his attempted drive too early and the outside edge falls just short of Vandersay at short third man! Vandersay's left hand is bleeding
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: another jaffa to end the over. Slower ball on off, and angling away from de Kock. Mistimes his drive as the ball whizzes past his outside edge
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: offspin, outside off and turning inwards. Worked off his pads to the leg side
Commentary_short: de Silva to Hendricks, no run

Commentary: faster one, length outside off, and the attempted off-side punch takes the outside edge! Races away to the third-man boundary
Commentary_short: de Silva to Hendricks, FOUR runs

Commentary: full just outside off, and de Kock goes for the reverse sweep. Misses, and they appeal for lbw but there was a nick
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on off, and he drives with the bat's closed face to midwicket
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: yorker on leg, and dug away to mid-on
full on off, and flicked off his toes to the square-leg region for a single
length ball, just outside off, and worked off his pads to the leg side
slower ball, full just outside off, and driven with the bat's open face to cover
slower ball, full on off and jagging inwards. Nudged off his pads to square leg
full just outside off, and the slower ball is gently tapped away to cover for a jogging single
full on leg, from around the wicket. Ball straightens after pitching, and QdK misses an expansive sweep
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length ball on off, and de Kock makes room to cut. Mistimed to point
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: low full toss on leg, and de Kock makes room before slogging over mid-on. One-bounce four
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: top-edged over square leg! Lands safely beyond the two infielders, but de Kock wants the third run and this could be trouble. Is Reeza short? Looks like it! South Africa get two runs, but Dickwella has run Hendricks out at the batsman's end
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, 2 runs, OUT

Commentary: length ball on off, and turning inwards sharply. Faf goes onto the back foot, and surprisingly plays this towards the leg side
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: nearly a yorker on leg, and he thumps this straight to the bowler. Dhananjaya gets a hand to it, but can't stop the run
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: googly first ball. Length ball wide outside off, but turning into his pads. Jammed onto his pads
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: another wrong'un! Length ball wide outside off, and spinning inwards. Fended towards the leg side off the back foot
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: length ball, wide outside off and skidding through. Faf makes room, and mistimes a punch to mid off
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: up and over! Full on off, and Faf gets to the pitch of the ball, settles on one knee, and sweeps over the leg side
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball on off, and the googly is worked off the back foot to deep midwicket. They want two, and this time the run is taken safely
full on off, and the wrong'un is driven with the turn to long on
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full on off, and he tries to play the reverse sweep again. Misses the shot altogether, and it hits Dickwella's gloves
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full outside leg, and skidding into him. He makes room to tap this down to mid-on, but the ball hits his thigh guard and rolls down to third man
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, 1 leg bye

Commentary: full on leg, and tapped back to the bowler. He fields swiftly and throws it back to the keeper
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and it skids through to Faf. Tries to muscle a shot towards the leg side, and he's very nearly stumped! Dickwella can't hold on though
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: half-tracker on middle, and hoicked to the deep midwicket boundary! Nice roll of the wrists to place it where he wanted
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: full on off, and driven to Dhananjaya off the front foot
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: soft dismissal! Length ball on leg, and de Kock goes for a reverse paddle. He gloves the ball, and it's lobbed in the air. Dickwella stays at his spot and takes the easiest of catches behind the stumps
Dismissal_text: Q de Kock c Dickwella b Dananjaya 13 (25m 17b 2x4 0x6) SR: 76.47

Commentary: length ball, wide outside off, and turning into the right hander. Tapped off the back foot to long on
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: full on off, and the legbreak is punched to cover off the front foot
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: length ball on off, and nudged off his pads to deep midwicket. Long on intercepts
quicker ball, length outside off, and cut with the turn to deep point
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: flighted full on off, and driven with the bat's open face to cover. Tidy over
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full on off, and the googly is driven to long on
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length ball outside leg, and no real turn thereafter. Faf rocks back, goes deep, and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball on off, and turning away from the batsman. Flat-bats a pull, but straight to the fielder in the deep
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: nearly a yorker on off, and dug back to Vandersay
Commentary_short: Vandersay to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: skidder on off, and worked off his pads to midwicket. Vandersay gives the ball a chase since that region's vacant
length ball, wide outside off and turning further away. He drags a flat-batted pull to wide long on
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: full on off, and he takes a big stride forward to meet the ball. Driven to long on
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: low full toss on off, and he hammers a shot straight to the bowler. Faf's lucky that the ball drops just short
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full on off, but Faf dances down the wicket before going inside out over cover! Exquisite
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, SIX runs

Commentary: low full toss outside leg, and drilled to long on
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and tapped to cover for a quick single
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: full on off, and he mistimes a cover drive. Inside-edged to the leg side
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: in the air! But short of midwicket. Length ball on middle, and spinning down the leg side, but Faf's attempted nudge takes the bat's handle and lobs towards the leg side
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, turning away from him and punched to cover
Commentary_short: Vandersay to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full on leg, and going further down. Faf goes for an expansive sweep, but the extra turn does him in

thick outside edge to point! And South Africa are in trouble. Full, flighted outside off, and he tries to lift this over cover. But extra turn finds the bat's outside edge, and this has lobbed straight to Dhananjaya
Dismissal_text: F du Plessis c de Silva b Vandersay 21 (23m 23b 2x4 1x6) SR: 91.30

Commentary: length ball, outside off and turning further away. Wicketkeeper Miller throws his hands at this, and he slaps it away to cover for four
full on off, and driven away from his body to cover
low full toss on off, and he muscles a straight drive to long on. Wanted to pitch it full, but overdid it
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: half tracker on off, and pulled to long on
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: worked off his pads to the leg side
length ball, too wide outside off, and carved away to backward point. Can't beat the infield
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on off, and he rocks back, before tapping to cover with gentle hands. They scamper across for one
length ball, wide outside off, and turning further away. Cut square to cover
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: quicker ball, wide outside off, and slapped to deep point. Man positioned there for that very shot
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length ball outside off, and turning away. Tapped off the front foot - rather tentatively - to the bowler
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and he settles on one knee to slog sweep. Mistimed to deep backward square
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: beauty! Full on middle, and spinning across Miller. He tries to defend after coming onto the front foot, but the ball turns away from the blade
full on leg, and Miller shuffles across to the off side - exposing his leg stump - before hammering a slog sweep to the fine-leg boundary. Whacked!
full on middle, and turning away from Miller. He drills a straight drive to long off
big appeal for lbw but not given! Length ball on middle, and skidding in as van der Dussen misses a flick. Keeper and bowler go up in unison, but ball was going down leg for certain
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: slower ball from Udana. And comfortably steered to third man for a single
back of the hand slower ball. Full on off, and angling across. Tapped away to cover
Commentary_short: Udana to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: full toss on his hips, and whipped away to deep midwicket. Goes to the fielder on the bounce

is that run out? Udana isn't sure so he wants the umpire to check. This was muscled to deep midwicket, and Miller was coming back for the second run. Throw from the deep hits Udana's hands before it dislodges the bails. Miller, though, is certain he's in
Commentary_short: Udana to van der Dussen, 2 runs

Commentary: length ball on middle, and nudged off his pads to deep midwicket. Another dangerous double from Miller, and he comfortably makes it in. Ball hits Udana's shin though
Commentary_short: Udana to van der Dussen, 2 runs

Commentary: length ball on leg, and whipped off his hips to deep midwicket. Same spot, but only a single this time
Commentary_short: Udana to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: full on off, and swept to deep backward square. Just a single
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on off, and he tries to play the late cut. But ball's too close to his body, and it flies off his bat's handle to third man
tapped away to the off side, and they scamper across for one
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, wide outside off, and slapped with the turn to deep extra cover. Solid work from Mendis at the deep, stops the second run
length ball, wide outside off, and turning further away. Tapped off the back foot to cover
Commentary_short: Vandersay to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, wide outside off and spinning further away. Guided to point for a single
smoked! low full toss on his pads, and he drills this flicked shot to deep midwicket. Finds the gap between two outfielders
returns with a slower ball. Back of the hand slower ball outside off, and Miller's through his attempted cut too early
another slower ball, but this is a half-tracker. Stays on the back foot, and hammers a pull to deep midwicket

through the fielder in the deep! Full toss on leg, and he flicks behind square! Man in the deep runs forward to intercept, but the ball bounces just in front of him before skidding across the grass and into the boundary-rope
tees off! Full, too slow outside off, and Miller was waiting for the change of pace. Lifts this over extra cover, and this is going into the stands!
full toss on leg, and nudged to fine leg. They come back for a dangerous second, and that's 20 off the over. Fifty partnership too
length ball on off, and turning away from the right-hander. Cut to deep point
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on middle, and spinning across the left-hander. Guided to cover
tapped away off the back foot to short cover, and that's another easy single
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg, and he offers the bat's straight face to drive to long on
superb! Tossed up, just outside off, and he slog sweeps over cow corner. Such sweet timing. Oof
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, SIX runs

Commentary: edged! And Dickwella's too slow to react. Length ball, just outside off, and the attempted tap off the back foot takes an outside edge. Races away to the third-man boundary. Goes for 14
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball, on leg stump, and he guides this fine to the fielder at fine leg

length ball on middle, and jagging inwards after hitting the deck. Van der Dussen misses the leg-side flick, and the umpire turns the appeal down. Was close, but ball would've probably gone down elg anyway
Commentary_short: Malinga to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: full on off, and he goes for a wild leg-side slog. Gets a leading edge and Udana at third man makes no mistake!
Commentary_short: Malinga to van der Dussen, OUT
Dismissal_text: HE van der Dussen c Udana b Malinga 34 (48m 30b 1x4 1x6) SR: 113.33

Commentary: full, just outside off, and seaming away after hitting the deck. Misses the attempted cover drive. This one's through to Dickwella

length ball on leg, and worked away with the bat's closed face to deep midwicket. But Miller's too slow to come back, and the fielder at the deep has delivered a flat throw. Dickwella reaches out, collects well, whips the bails off, and the set Miller is gone! An applause for Miller, but he'll be disappointed not finishing the game off
Dismissal_text: DA Miller run out (BKG Mendis/†Dickwella) 41 (37m 23b 5x4 1x6) SR: 178.26

Commentary: length ball on off, and tapped away to point off the back foot
full outside off, from around the wicket, and the attempted tap towards cover takes a big outside edge. Runs past the keeper's left, and the fielder at short third man can't cut it off!
Commentary_short: de Silva to Duminy, FOUR runs

Commentary: half-tracker outside off, and he drags a pulled shot to deep midwicket
arm ball, wide outside off and extra turn off the pitch. Surprises Phehlukwayo, who tried to cut
Commentary_short: de Silva to Phehlukwayo, no run

Commentary: crunched! Fast and full on middle, but he brings out the reverse sweep. No chance for anybody!
Commentary_short: de Silva to Phehlukwayo, FOUR runs

Commentary: is that six, nope! Full just outside off, but Phehlukwayo can't resist himself. Skips down the ground to slog over long off, but this finds the bat's toe end
Dismissal_text: AL Phehlukwayo c Udana b de Silva 4 (5m 4b 1x4 0x6) SR: 100.00

Commentary: tapped away to point, and they want the quick run! Completed, rather comfortably
slower ball, full on leg, and defended towards the leg side
full on off, and driven with the bat's open face to deep point. Happy to take a single
full just outside off, and the ball grips off the surface, before going past his outside edge. Through to the keeper
full on leg, and he's too quick to defend. Ball hits the bat's top half, and nearly goes all the way to Malinga
yorker, dipping outside off, and going straight into Dickwella's gloves. South Africa need 5 off 7
Malinga, you beauty! The wily ol' fox has a bag of tricks, doesn't he? Slower ball, full on leg, and Rabada goes for a big slog. He misses, ball hits.
slower ball on off, and guided off his hips to deep square leg. Can they take the second run? Nope
full outside off, and angling away from Steyn. Tries to muscle this over square leg, but misses. Nerves!
play and a miss! Sri Lanka are now officially ahead. Slower ball, length on middle, and Steyn can't connect with the pull
length ball on middle, and he muscles a pull to deep midwicket

slower ball, full and wide outside off, and he drags a shot to deep midwicket. Duminy wants the second run, but there's no way he'll be able to make it back. Throw from the deep is flat and straight, and Dickwella affects another run out! Duminy gone

It's a Super Over! Dickwella has missed the easiest run-out of his life. Length ball on off, and Dickwella tries to cut, but the ball's been under-edged to Dickwella. Steyn runs from the other end, and Dickwella takes aim at all three stumps, but he misses! This is a tie (for now)
